name: Chang Hyun Park 0001
content: Chang Hyun Park Chang Hyun Park I am an Assistant Professor at the Uppsala Architecture Research Team, Uppsala University My previous positions were: Post-doctoral researcher at Uppsala University working with Professor David Black-Schaffer PhD student at the Computer Architecture and Systems Lab in KAIST, advised by Professor Jaehyuk Huh Contact Information: Email: chang.hyun.park [_a_t_] it.uu.se Linkedin Profile, Google Scholar, DBLP Profile Research Interests My research interests are in the following: Architectural support for system softwares: both native and virtualized. The virtual memory system and address translation, cache and memory systems. Virtual memory system and address translation for emerging memory systems such as stacked DRAM and NVRAM. Virtual memory system for I/O devices (NVMe, Network, etc.) and Accelerators (GPUs, NPUs, etc.) Publications Conferences Wonung Kim, Yubin Lee, Yoonsung Kim, Jinwoo Hwang, Seongryong Oh, Jiyong Jung,
